concept.title: 208.002 Priorities for use of mandatory supply sources.

conbody.p: (a)(1) Supplies. (i) See the guidance at PGI 208.002(a)(1)(i) to obtain information on available items in DoDâ€™s property inventories.
(v) See subpart 208.70, Coordinated Acquisition, and subpart 208.74, Enterprise Software Agreements.
